00035 #define ARRAY_SIZE 15 
00036 #define UPPER_LIMIT 1100 
00037 #define LOWER_LIMIT 0 
00038 #define REJECTED_HOLES 250 
00039 #define THRESHOLD 325 
00040 #define PROCESS_NOISE 0.1 
00041 #define SENSOR_NOISE 6.35 
00042 #define NUMBER_OF_DETECTIONS 4 
00043 #define STOP_TIME 350000 
00046   using namespace std;

00049

00067 
00068 void detector::kalman_filter(void)
00069 {
00075   vector<int>  sensor1_data(ARRAY_SIZE);
00076   vector<int>  sensor2_data(ARRAY_SIZE);
00077   vector<int>  sensor3_data(ARRAY_SIZE);
00078   vector<int>  timebase_data(ARRAY_SIZE);
00079   vector<char> counter(4);
00080   
00081   int  sensor1_mean=0; //mean value of the sensor1 data
00082   int  sensor2_mean=0; //mean value of the sensor2 data
00083   int  sensor3_mean=0; //mean value of the sensor3 data
00084   
00085   char isAhole;
00086   bool hole_detected_flag=0;
00087   
00088   int  Iter_num = 0; //number of current iteration
00089   int  NOH = 0; //number of detected holes
00090   double last_time_detected = 0;
00091   int milliseconds = 0;
00092   int seconds = 0;
00093   int minutes = 0;
00094   
00102     float q = PROCESS_NOISE; //process noise
00103     float r = SENSOR_NOISE; //sensor noise
00104     float p = 0; //estimated error
00105     float k; //kalman gain
00106 
00107   while(true)
00108   {
00109 
00110     for (int i = (ARRAY_SIZE-1); i>0; i--)
00111     {
00116       sensor1_data.at(i) = sensor1_data.at(i-1);
00117       sensor2_data.at(i) = sensor2_data.at(i-1);
00118       sensor3_data.at(i) = sensor3_data.at(i-1);
00119       timebase_data.at(i) = timebase_data.at(i-1);
00125       sensor1_mean = sensor1_data.at(i)+sensor1_mean;
00126       sensor2_mean = sensor2_data.at(i)+sensor2_mean;
00127       sensor3_mean = sensor3_data.at(i)+sensor3_mean;
00128     }
00129 
00130   
00136     p = p+q;
00137     k = p/(p+r);
00138     
00139     sensor1_data.at(0) = (int)(sensor1_data.at(0) + k*(sensor1.read()-sensor1_data.at(0)));
00140     sensor2_data.at(0) = (int)(sensor2_data.at(0) + k*(sensor2.read()-sensor2_data.at(0)));
00141     sensor3_data.at(0) = (int)(sensor3_data.at(0) + k*(sensor3.read()-sensor3_data.at(0)));
00142     timebase_data.at(0) = timebase.read();
00143     p = (1-k)*p;
00144 
00145   
00149     if(sensor1_data.at(0) > 3500) sensor1_data.at(0) = sensor1_mean;
00150     if(sensor2_data.at(0) > 3500) sensor2_data.at(0) = sensor2_mean;
00151     if(sensor3_data.at(0) > 3500) sensor3_data.at(0) = sensor3_mean;   
00152   
00159     sensor1_mean = (sensor1_data.at(0)+sensor1_mean)/ARRAY_SIZE; 
00160     sensor2_mean = (sensor2_data.at(0)+sensor2_mean)/ARRAY_SIZE;
00161     sensor3_mean = (sensor3_data.at(0)+sensor3_mean)/ARRAY_SIZE;
00162     
00163     // detection flag. 
00164     if((sensor1_data.at(0) >= (sensor1_mean+THRESHOLD))||(sensor1_data.at(0) <= (sensor1_mean-THRESHOLD))) isAhole++;
00165     if((sensor2_data.at(0) >= (sensor2_mean+THRESHOLD))||(sensor2_data.at(0) <= (sensor2_mean-THRESHOLD))) isAhole++;
00166     if((sensor3_data.at(0) >= (sensor3_mean+THRESHOLD))||(sensor3_data.at(0) <= (sensor3_mean-THRESHOLD))) isAhole++;
00167 
00168   
00169   if(isAhole > NUMBER_OF_DETECTIONS)
00170   {
00175     hole_detected_flag = 1;
00176     isAhole = 0;
00177   }
00178 
00184     if(((hole_detected_flag==1)&&(Iter_num>ARRAY_SIZE))&&((timebase_data.at(0)<STOP_TIME)&&((timebase_data.at(0)-last_time_detected)>3500))) 
00185     {                 
00186       hole_detected.write(1);
00187       hole_detected_flag = 0;
00188       NOH = NOH++; //number of holes
00189       last_time_detected = timebase_data.at(0);
00190 
00206       milliseconds = timebase_data.at(0)%1000;
00207       seconds = (timebase_data.at(0) / 1000) % 60 ;
00208       minutes = ((timebase_data.at(0)/ (1000*60)) % 60);
00215     }
00216     else
00217     {
00218       hole_detected.write(0);
00219     } 
00220     
00221     wait();
00222     Iter_num = Iter_num++;
00223     sensor1_mean = 0;
00224     sensor2_mean = 0;
00225     sensor3_mean = 0;
00226   
00227   }
00228 }

00230 
00231 void detector::first_algorithm()
00232 { 
00233 int  sensor1_data[ARRAY_SIZE];
00234 int  sensor2_data[ARRAY_SIZE];
00235 int  sensor3_data[ARRAY_SIZE];
00236 int  sensor4_data[ARRAY_SIZE];
00237 int  timebase_data[ARRAY_SIZE];
00238 
00239 int  sensor1_mean=0; //mean value of the sensor1 data
00240 int  sensor2_mean=0; //mean value of the sensor2 data
00241 int  sensor3_mean=0; //mean value of the sensor3 data
00242 int  sensor4_mean=0; //mean value of the sensor4 data
00243 
00244 int  hole_rejection[REJECTED_HOLES]; //variable to reject close holes
00245 int  hole_rejection_flag=0;
00246 bool hole_detected_flag=0;
00247 int  Iter_num = 0; //number of current iteration
00248 int  NOH = 0; //number of detected holes
00249 
00250 int milliseconds = 0;
00251 int seconds = 0;
00252 int minutes = 0;
00253 
00254 
00255   for (int i = (REJECTED_HOLES-1);i>=0;i--) //hole_rejection inicialization
00256   {
00257     hole_rejection[i]=0;
00258   }
00259   
00260   for (int i = (ARRAY_SIZE-1); i>=0; i--) //sensors and timebase inicialization
00261   {
00262     sensor1_data[i] =0;
00263     sensor2_data[i] =0;
00264     sensor3_data[i] =0;
00265     sensor4_data[i] =0;
00266     timebase_data[i]=0;
00267   }
00268 
00275   while ( true )  { 
00276 
00277     for (int i = (ARRAY_SIZE-1); i>0; i--)
00278     {
00283       sensor1_data[i] = sensor1_data[i-1];
00284       sensor2_data[i] = sensor2_data[i-1];
00285       sensor3_data[i] = sensor3_data[i-1];
00286       sensor4_data[i] = sensor4_data[i-1];
00287       timebase_data[i] = timebase_data[i-1];
00288 
00295       sensor1_mean = sensor1_data[i]+sensor1_mean;
00296       sensor2_mean = sensor2_data[i]+sensor2_mean;
00297       sensor3_mean = sensor3_data[i]+sensor3_mean;
00298       sensor4_mean = sensor4_data[i]+sensor4_mean;
00299     }
00300     
00304     sensor1_data[0] = (sensor1.read()+sensor1_data[1]+sensor1_data[2]+sensor1_data[3]+sensor1_data[4])/5; //LPF to reduce noise
00305     sensor2_data[0] = (sensor2.read()+sensor2_data[1]+sensor2_data[2]+sensor2_data[3]+sensor2_data[4])/5;
00306     sensor3_data[0] = (sensor3.read()+sensor3_data[1]+sensor3_data[2]+sensor3_data[3]+sensor3_data[4])/5;
00307     sensor4_data[0] = (sensor4.read()+sensor4_data[1]+sensor4_data[2]+sensor4_data[3]+sensor4_data[4])/5;
00308     timebase_data[0] = timebase.read();
00309     
00310     sensor1_mean = (sensor1_data[0]+sensor1_mean)/ARRAY_SIZE; //mean values to compare
00311     sensor2_mean = (sensor2_data[0]+sensor2_mean)/ARRAY_SIZE;
00312     sensor3_mean = (sensor3_data[0]+sensor3_mean)/ARRAY_SIZE;
00313     sensor4_mean = (sensor4_data[0]+sensor4_mean)/ARRAY_SIZE;
00314     
00315     //cout << "\nSensor mean: "<< sensor_mean <<"\n";
00316     
00317     for (int i = (REJECTED_HOLES-1); i>0;i--) 
00318     {
00322       hole_rejection[i] = hole_rejection[i-1];
00323       hole_rejection_flag = hole_rejection[i]+hole_rejection_flag;
00324     }
00329     hole_detected_flag = ((sensor1_data[0] >= (sensor1_mean+THRESHOLD))||(sensor1_data[0] <= (sensor1_mean-THRESHOLD))); // detection flag
00330     hole_detected_flag = ((sensor2_data[0] >= (sensor2_mean+THRESHOLD))||(sensor2_data[0] <= (sensor2_mean-THRESHOLD)))||(hole_detected_flag);
00331     hole_detected_flag = ((sensor3_data[0] >= (sensor3_mean+THRESHOLD))||(sensor3_data[0] <= (sensor3_mean-THRESHOLD)))||(hole_detected_flag);
00332     hole_detected_flag = ((sensor4_data[0] >= (sensor4_mean+THRESHOLD))||(sensor4_data[0] <= (sensor4_mean-THRESHOLD)))||(hole_detected_flag);
00333     hole_detected_flag = (hole_rejection_flag==0)&&(hole_detected_flag);
00334     
00335     if(hole_detected_flag==1) 
00336     {
00341       hole_detected.write(1);
00342       NOH = NOH++;
00343       hole_rejection[0] = 1;
00344       hole_rejection_flag =0;
00345       
00346       
00362       milliseconds = timebase_data[0]%1000;
00363       seconds = (timebase_data[0] / 1000) % 60 ;
00364       minutes = ((timebase_data[0]/ (1000*60)) % 60);
00370     }
00371     else
00372     {
00373       hole_detected.write(0);
00374       hole_rejection[0] = 0;
00375       hole_rejection_flag =0;
00376     } 
00377     wait();
00378     Iter_num = Iter_num++;
00379     //cout << "\t\t\n HRF: " << hole_rejection_flag<<"\n";
00380     //cout << "\n Iteration number: " << Iter_num<<"\n";
00381     //cout << "\n Number of Holes detected: "<< NOH<<"\n";
00382     
00383     
00384   }
00385 }

00387 
00388 void detector::p1_algorithm()
00389 {
00394   vector<int>  sensor1_data(ARRAY_SIZE);
00395   vector<int>  sensor2_data(ARRAY_SIZE);
00396   vector<int>  sensor3_data(ARRAY_SIZE);
00397   vector<int>  sensor4_data(ARRAY_SIZE);
00398   vector<int>  timebase_data(ARRAY_SIZE);
00399   vector<char> counter(4);
00400   char isAhole;
00401   
00402   vector<int>  hole_rejection(REJECTED_HOLES); //variable to reject close holes
00403   int  hole_rejection_flag=0;
00404   bool hole_detected_flag=0;
00405   int  Iter_num = 0; //number of current iteration
00406   int  NOH = 0; //number of detected holes
00407 
00408   int milliseconds = 0;
00409   int seconds = 0;
00410   int minutes = 0;    
00411   
00412   
00413   /*algorithm loop*/
00414   
00415     while(1)
00416     {
00417       /*Move values to its next position in the array*/
00418       for (int i = (ARRAY_SIZE-1); i>0; i--)
00419       {
00420     
00425     sensor1_data.at(i) = sensor1_data.at(i-1);
00426     sensor2_data.at(i) = sensor2_data.at(i-1);
00427     sensor3_data.at(i) = sensor3_data.at(i-1);
00428     sensor4_data.at(i) = sensor4_data.at(i-1);
00429     timebase_data.at(i) = timebase_data.at(i-1);
00430     
00434     if((sensor1_data.at(0) > UPPER_LIMIT)||(sensor1_data[i] < LOWER_LIMIT)) counter.at(0) = counter.at(0) + 1;
00435     if((sensor2_data.at(0) > UPPER_LIMIT)||(sensor2_data[i] < LOWER_LIMIT)) counter.at(1) = counter.at(1) + 1;
00436     if((sensor3_data.at(0) > UPPER_LIMIT)||(sensor3_data[i] < LOWER_LIMIT)) counter.at(2) = counter.at(2) + 1;
00437     if((sensor4_data.at(0) > UPPER_LIMIT)||(sensor4_data[i] < LOWER_LIMIT)) counter.at(3) = counter.at(3) + 1;
00438       }
00439 
00444       sensor1_data.at(0) = sensor1.read();
00445       if (sensor1_data.at(0) > 3500) sensor1_data.at(0) = 900;
00446       sensor2_data.at(0) = sensor2.read();
00447       if (sensor2_data.at(0) > 3500) sensor2_data.at(0) = 900;
00448       sensor3_data.at(0) = sensor3.read();
00449       if (sensor3_data.at(0) > 3500) sensor3_data.at(0) = 900;
00450       sensor4_data.at(0) = 900;
00451       timebase_data.at(0) = timebase.read();
00452       
00453       if((sensor1_data.at(0) > UPPER_LIMIT)||(sensor1_data.at(0) < LOWER_LIMIT)) counter.at(0) = counter.at(0) + 1;
00454       if((sensor2_data.at(0) > UPPER_LIMIT)||(sensor2_data.at(0) < LOWER_LIMIT)) counter.at(1) = counter.at(1) + 1;
00455       if((sensor3_data.at(0) > UPPER_LIMIT)||(sensor3_data.at(0) < LOWER_LIMIT)) counter.at(2) = counter.at(2) + 1;
00456       if((sensor4_data.at(0) > UPPER_LIMIT)||(sensor4_data.at(0) < LOWER_LIMIT)) counter.at(3) = counter.at(3) + 1;
00457     
00462     for (int i = (REJECTED_HOLES-1); i>0; i--) //If a hole is detected to any other hole near 80 samples, it is ignored for it's too close (LPF)
00463     {
00464       hole_rejection.at(i) = hole_rejection.at(i-1);
00465       hole_rejection_flag = hole_rejection[i]+hole_rejection_flag;
00466     }
00467     
00472     for(int i = 0; i<4; i++)
00473     {
00474       isAhole = isAhole + counter.at(i);
00475       if(isAhole > 28) hole_detected_flag = 1;
00476       hole_detected_flag = (hole_rejection_flag==0)&&(hole_detected_flag);
00477     }
00478     
00479     
00480     if(hole_detected_flag==1)
00481     {
00482       
00487       hole_detected.write(1);
00488       NOH = NOH++;
00489       hole_rejection.at(0) = 1;
00490       hole_rejection_flag =0;
00491       
00507       milliseconds = timebase_data.at(0)%1000;
00508       seconds = (timebase_data.at(0) / 1000) % 60 ;
00509       minutes = ((timebase_data.at(0)/ (1000*60)) % 60);
00515     }
00516     else
00517     {
00518       hole_detected.write(0);
00519       hole_rejection.at(0) = 0;
00520       hole_rejection_flag =0;
00521     } 
00522     
00523     wait(); //waits for a new clock pulse
00524     Iter_num = Iter_num++;
00525    
00529       for (int i = 0; i<counter.size(); i++)
00530       {
00531     counter.at(i) = 0;
00532       }
00533     isAhole = 0;
00534    
00535   }
00536 }
00537 
00538 
00539 void detector::l1_algorithm()
00540 { 
00541 int  sensor1_data[ARRAY_SIZE];
00542 int  sensor2_data[ARRAY_SIZE];
00543 int  sensor3_data[ARRAY_SIZE];
00544 int  sensor4_data[ARRAY_SIZE];
00545 int  timebase_data[ARRAY_SIZE];
00546 
00547 int  sensor1_mean=0; //mean value of the sensor1 data
00548 int  sensor2_mean=0; //mean value of the sensor2 data
00549 int  sensor3_mean=0; //mean value of the sensor3 data
00550 int  sensor4_mean=0; //mean value of the sensor4 data
00551 int  last_time_detected =0;
00552 
00553 int  threshold =THRESHOLD; //maximum allowed variation to ignore
00554 
00555 int  hole_samples[REJECTED_HOLES]; // if the number of samples per hole is not achieved the hole won't be detected (LPF)
00556 int  minimum_samples = 3;
00557 int  hole_samples_sum = 0;
00558 
00559 bool hole_detected_flag=0;
00560 int  Iter_num = 0; //number of current iteration
00561 int  NOH = 0; //number of detected holes
00562 
00563 int milliseconds = 0;
00564 int seconds = 0;
00565 int minutes = 0;
00566 
00567 
00568  
00569   for (int i =(REJECTED_HOLES-1);i>=0;i--) //hole_samples inicialization
00570   {
00571     hole_samples[i]=0;
00572   }
00573   
00574   for (int i = (ARRAY_SIZE-1); i>=0; i--) //sensors and timebase inicialization
00575   {
00576     sensor1_data[i] =0;
00577     sensor2_data[i] =0;
00578     sensor3_data[i] =0;
00579     sensor4_data[i] =0;
00580     timebase_data[i]=0;
00581   }
00587   while ( true )  { 
00588 
00589 
00590     for (int i = (ARRAY_SIZE-1); i>0; i--)
00591     {
00596       sensor1_data[i] = sensor1_data[i-1];
00597       sensor2_data[i] = sensor2_data[i-1];
00598       sensor3_data[i] = sensor3_data[i-1];
00599       sensor4_data[i] = sensor4_data[i-1];
00600       timebase_data[i] = timebase_data[i-1];
00601       
00602       sensor1_mean = sensor1_data[i]+sensor1_mean;
00603       sensor2_mean = sensor2_data[i]+sensor2_mean;
00604       sensor3_mean = sensor3_data[i]+sensor3_mean;
00605       sensor4_mean = sensor4_data[i]+sensor4_mean;
00606     }
00607     
00608     
00612     sensor1_data[0] =sensor1.read();
00613     if(sensor1_data[0]<0)
00614     {
00615       sensor1_data[0] = -sensor1_data[0];
00616     }
00617     
00618     
00619     sensor2_data[0] =sensor2.read();
00620     if(sensor2_data[0]<0)
00621     {
00622       sensor2_data[0] = -sensor2_data[0];
00623     }
00624     
00625     
00626     sensor3_data[0] =sensor3.read();
00627     if(sensor3_data[0]<0)
00628     {
00629       sensor3_data[0] = -sensor3_data[0];
00630     }
00631     
00632     
00633     sensor4_data[0] =sensor4.read();
00634     if(sensor4_data[0]<0)
00635     {
00636       sensor4_data[0] = -sensor4_data[0];
00637     }
00638     
00639     
00643     sensor1_data[0] = (sensor1_data[0]+sensor1_data[1])/2;//+sensor1_data[2])/3;//+sensor1_data[3]+sensor1_data[4])/5; 
00644     sensor2_data[0] = (sensor2_data[0]+sensor2_data[1])/2;//+sensor2_data[2])/3;//+sensor2_data[3]+sensor2_data[4])/5;
00645     sensor3_data[0] = (sensor3_data[0]+sensor3_data[1])/2;//+sensor3_data[2])/3;//+sensor3_data[3]+sensor3_data[4])/5;
00646     sensor4_data[0] = (sensor4_data[0]+sensor4_data[1])/2;//+sensor4_data[2])/3;//+sensor4_data[3]+sensor4_data[4])/5;
00647 
00648     
00649     timebase_data[0] = timebase.read();
00650     
00651     sensor1_mean = (sensor1_data[0]+sensor1_mean)/ARRAY_SIZE; 
00652     sensor2_mean = (sensor2_data[0]+sensor2_mean)/ARRAY_SIZE;
00653     sensor3_mean = (sensor3_data[0]+sensor3_mean)/ARRAY_SIZE;
00654     sensor4_mean = (sensor4_data[0]+sensor4_mean)/ARRAY_SIZE;
00655     
00656     
00657     //cout << "\nSensor mean: "<< sensor_mean <<"\n";
00658     
00663     for (int i = (REJECTED_HOLES-1); i>0;i--) 
00664     {
00665       hole_samples[i] = hole_samples[i-1];
00666     }
00667     hole_samples[0] = 0; 
00668     
00673     hole_detected_flag = ((sensor1_data[0] >= (sensor1_mean+THRESHOLD))||(sensor1_data[0] <= (sensor1_mean-THRESHOLD)));
00674     hole_detected_flag = ((sensor2_data[0] >= (sensor2_mean+THRESHOLD))||(sensor2_data[0] <= (sensor2_mean-THRESHOLD)))||(hole_detected_flag);
00675     hole_detected_flag = ((sensor3_data[0] >= (sensor3_mean+THRESHOLD))||(sensor3_data[0] <= (sensor3_mean-THRESHOLD)))||(hole_detected_flag);
00676     hole_detected_flag = ((sensor4_data[0] >= (sensor4_mean+THRESHOLD))||(sensor4_data[0] <= (sensor4_mean-THRESHOLD)))||(hole_detected_flag);
00677     
00682     if (hole_detected_flag ==1)
00683     {
00684       hole_samples[0] = 1;
00685       //cout<<"\n\thole detected flag: "<< hole_detected_flag<<"\n";
00686     }
00687     
00688     hole_samples_sum = 0;
00689     
00693     for (int i= (5-1); i>=0; i--)
00694     {
00695       hole_samples_sum = hole_samples[i] + hole_samples_sum;
00696       //cout<<"\n\thole samples sum: "<< hole_samples_sum<<"\n";
00697     }
00698     
00699     hole_detected_flag = (hole_detected_flag)&&(hole_samples_sum >= minimum_samples);
00700 
00701     
00702     
00707     if(((hole_detected_flag==1)&&(Iter_num>ARRAY_SIZE))&&((timebase_data[0]<STOP_TIME)&&((timebase_data[0]-last_time_detected)>500))) 
00708     {
00713       hole_detected.write(1);
00714       NOH = NOH++; //number of holes
00715       last_time_detected = timebase_data[0];
00716       
00732       milliseconds = timebase_data[0]%1000;
00733       seconds = (timebase_data[0] / 1000) % 60 ;
00734       minutes = ((timebase_data[0]/ (1000*60)) % 60);
00740     }
00741     else
00742     {
00743       hole_detected.write(0);
00744     } 
00745     //..................................................
00746     
00747     wait();
00748     Iter_num = Iter_num++;
00749     //cout << "\t\t\n HRF: " << hole_rejection_flag<<"\n";
00750     //cout << "\n Iteration number: " << Iter_num<<"\n";
00751     //cout << "\n Number of Holes detected: "<< NOH<<"\n";
00752     
00753     
00754   }
00755 }
00756 
00757 
00758 void detector::l2_algorithm()
00759 { 
00760 int  sensor1_data[ARRAY_SIZE];
00761 int  sensor2_data[ARRAY_SIZE];
00762 int  sensor3_data[ARRAY_SIZE];
00763 int  sensor4_data[ARRAY_SIZE];
00764 int  timebase_data[ARRAY_SIZE];
00765 
00766 int  sensor1_mean=0; //mean value of the sensor1 data
00767 int  sensor2_mean=0; //mean value of the sensor2 data
00768 int  sensor3_mean=0; //mean value of the sensor3 data
00769 int  sensor4_mean=0; //mean value of the sensor4 data
00770 int  last_time_detected =0;
00771 
00772 int  threshold = THRESHOLD; //maximum allowed variation to ignore
00773 int  compare_temp =0;
00774 
00775 int  hole_samples[80]; // if the number of minimum samples per hole is not achieved the hole won't be detected (LPF)
00776 int  minimum_samples = 3;
00777 int  hole_samples_sum = 0;
00778 
00779 bool hole_detected_flag=0;
00780 int  Iter_num = 0; //number of current iteration
00781 int  NOH = 0; //number of detected holes
00782 
00783 int milliseconds = 0;
00784 int seconds = 0;
00785 int minutes = 0;
00786 
00787     
00788   for (int i =79;i>=0;i--) //hole_samples inicialization
00789   {
00790     hole_samples[i]=0;
00791   }
00792   
00793   for (int i = (ARRAY_SIZE-1); i>=0; i--) //sensors and timebase inicialization
00794   {
00795     sensor1_data[i] =0;
00796     sensor2_data[i] =0;
00797     sensor3_data[i] =0;
00798     sensor4_data[i] =0;
00799     timebase_data[i]=0;
00800   }
00801   
00807   while ( true )
00808   { 
00809 
00810     for (int i = (ARRAY_SIZE-1); i>0; i--)
00811     {
00812       
00818       sensor1_data[i] = sensor1_data[i-1];
00819       sensor2_data[i] = sensor2_data[i-1];
00820       sensor3_data[i] = sensor3_data[i-1];
00821       sensor4_data[i] = sensor4_data[i-1];
00822       timebase_data[i] = timebase_data[i-1];
00823       
00824       sensor1_mean = sensor1_data[i]+sensor1_mean;
00825       sensor2_mean = sensor2_data[i]+sensor2_mean;
00826       sensor3_mean = sensor3_data[i]+sensor3_mean;
00827       sensor4_mean = sensor4_data[i]+sensor4_mean;
00828      }
00829     
00830     
00835     sensor1_data[0] =sensor1.read();
00836     
00837     if(sensor1_data[0]<0)
00838     {
00839       sensor1_data[0] = -sensor1_data[0];
00840     }
00841         
00842     sensor2_data[0] =sensor2.read();
00843     
00844     if(sensor2_data[0]<0)
00845     {
00846       sensor2_data[0] = -sensor2_data[0];
00847     }
00848         
00849     sensor3_data[0] =sensor3.read();
00850     
00851     if(sensor3_data[0]<0)
00852     {
00853       sensor3_data[0] = -sensor3_data[0];
00854     }
00855         
00856     sensor4_data[0] =sensor4.read();
00857     
00858     if(sensor4_data[0]<0)
00859     {
00860       sensor4_data[0] = -sensor4_data[0];
00861     }
00862 
00863     
00864     
00868     sensor1_data[0] = (sensor1_data[0]+sensor1_data[1]+sensor1_data[2])/3;//+sensor1_data[3]+sensor1_data[4])/5; 
00869     sensor2_data[0] = (sensor2_data[0]+sensor2_data[1]+sensor2_data[2])/3;//+sensor2_data[3]+sensor2_data[4])/5;
00870     sensor3_data[0] = (sensor3_data[0]+sensor3_data[1]+sensor3_data[2])/3;//+sensor3_data[3]+sensor3_data[4])/5;
00871     sensor4_data[0] = (sensor4_data[0]+sensor4_data[1]+sensor4_data[2])/3;//+sensor4_data[3]+sensor4_data[4])/5;
00872 
00873     
00874     timebase_data[0] = timebase.read();
00875     
00876     
00881     sensor1_mean = (sensor1_data[0]+sensor1_mean)/ARRAY_SIZE; 
00882     sensor2_mean = (sensor2_data[0]+sensor2_mean)/ARRAY_SIZE;
00883     sensor3_mean = (sensor3_data[0]+sensor3_mean)/ARRAY_SIZE;
00884     sensor4_mean = (sensor4_data[0]+sensor4_mean)/ARRAY_SIZE;
00885 
00886     
00887     
00888     //cout << "\nSensor mean: "<< sensor_mean <<"\n";
00889     
00895     for (int i = (REJECTED_HOLES); i>0;i--)
00896     {
00897       hole_samples[i] = hole_samples[i-1];
00898     }
00899     hole_samples[0] = 0;
00900     
00901     
00906     compare_temp = abs(sensor1_mean-sensor1_data[0]);
00907     compare_temp = compare_temp+abs(sensor2_mean-sensor2_data[0]);
00908     compare_temp = compare_temp+abs(sensor3_mean-sensor3_data[0]);
00909     compare_temp = compare_temp+abs(sensor4_mean-sensor4_data[0]);
00910         
00911     hole_detected_flag = (compare_temp>4*threshold);
00912     
00913     /*
00914     hole_detected_flag = ((sensor1_data[0] >= (sensor1_mean+threshold))||(sensor1_data[0] <= (sensor1_mean-threshold)));
00915     hole_detected_flag = ((sensor2_data[0] >= (sensor2_mean+threshold))||(sensor2_data[0] <= (sensor2_mean-threshold)))||(hole_detected_flag);
00916     hole_detected_flag = ((sensor3_data[0] >= (sensor3_mean+threshold))||(sensor3_data[0] <= (sensor3_mean-threshold)))||(hole_detected_flag);
00917     hole_detected_flag = ((sensor4_data[0] >= (sensor4_mean+threshold))||(sensor4_data[0] <= (sensor4_mean-threshold)))||(hole_detected_flag);
00918     */
00919     
00924     if (hole_detected_flag ==1)
00925     {
00926       hole_samples[0] = 1;
00927       //cout<<"\n\thole detected flag: "<< hole_detected_flag<<"\n";
00928     }
00929 
00933     hole_samples_sum = 0;
00934     for (int i= (5-1); i>=0; i--)
00935     {
00936       hole_samples_sum = hole_samples[i] + hole_samples_sum;
00937       //cout<<"\n\thole samples sum: "<< hole_samples_sum<<"\n";
00938     }
00939     
00940     hole_detected_flag = (hole_detected_flag)&&(hole_samples_sum >= minimum_samples);
00941 
00942     
00949     if(((hole_detected_flag==1)&&(Iter_num>ARRAY_SIZE))&&((timebase_data[0]<STOP_TIME)&&((timebase_data[0]-last_time_detected)>500))) 
00950     {
00956       hole_detected.write(1);
00957       NOH = NOH++; //number of holes
00958       last_time_detected = timebase_data[0];
00959       
00975       milliseconds = timebase_data[0]%1000;
00976       seconds = (timebase_data[0] / 1000) % 60 ;
00977       minutes = ((timebase_data[0]/ (1000*60)) % 60);
00978       
00985     }
00986     else
00987     {
00988       hole_detected.write(0);
00989     } 
00990     
00991     wait();
00992     Iter_num = Iter_num++;
00993     //cout << "\t\t\n HRF: " << hole_rejection_flag<<"\n";
00994     //cout << "\n Iteration number: " << Iter_num<<"\n";
00995     //cout << "\n Number of Holes detected: "<< NOH<<"\n";
00996   }
00997     
00998 }
00999 
01000 
01001 void detector::p2_algorithm()
01002 {
01003 
01004 
01005   vector<float>  sensor1_data(ARRAY_SIZE);
01006   vector<float>  sensor2_data(ARRAY_SIZE);
01007   vector<float>  sensor3_data(ARRAY_SIZE);
01008   vector<float>  sensor4_data(ARRAY_SIZE);
01009   vector<int>  timebase_data(ARRAY_SIZE);
01010   float coeficients[ARRAY_SIZE] = {0.0005, 0.001, 0.0025, 0.005, 0.0075, 0.01, 0.0125, 0.025, 0.0125, 0.01, 0.0075, 0.005, 0.0025, 0.001, 0.0005};
01011   vector<char> counter(4);
01012   char isAhole;
01013   
01014   vector<int>  hole_rejection(REJECTED_HOLES); //variable to reject close holes
01015   int  hole_rejection_flag=0;
01016   bool hole_detected_flag=0;
01017   float  filter1 = 0, filter2 = 0, filter3 = 0, filter4 = 0;
01018   int  Iter_num = 0; //number of current iteration
01019   int  NOH = 0; //number of detected holes
01020 
01021   int milliseconds = 0;
01022   int seconds = 0;
01023   int minutes = 0;    
01024   
01030     while(1)
01031     {
01035       for (int i = (ARRAY_SIZE-1); i>0; i--)
01036       {
01037     sensor1_data.at(i) = sensor1_data.at(i-1);
01038     sensor2_data.at(i) = sensor2_data.at(i-1);
01039     sensor3_data.at(i) = sensor3_data.at(i-1);
01040     sensor4_data.at(i) = sensor4_data.at(i-1);
01041     timebase_data.at(i) = timebase_data.at(i-1);
01042       }
01043 
01047       sensor1_data.at(0) = sensor1.read() / 27.6233 / 2;
01048       if (sensor1_data.at(0) > 3500) sensor1_data.at(0) = 900;
01049       sensor2_data.at(0) = sensor2.read() / 27.6233 / 2;
01050       if (sensor2_data.at(0) > 3500) sensor2_data.at(0) = 900;
01051       sensor3_data.at(0) = sensor3.read() / 27.6233 / 2;
01052       if (sensor3_data.at(0) > 3500) sensor3_data.at(0) = 900;
01053       sensor4_data.at(0) = 900 / 27.6233 / 2;
01054       timebase_data.at(0) = timebase.read();
01055       
01056       for(int i = 0; i < (ARRAY_SIZE); i++)
01057       {
01061     filter1 = filter1 + coeficients[i]*sensor1_data.at(i);
01062     filter2 = filter2 + coeficients[i]*sensor2_data.at(i);
01063     filter3 = filter3 + coeficients[i]*sensor3_data.at(i);
01064     filter4 = filter4 + coeficients[i]*sensor4_data.at(i);
01065     //cout << filter1 << endl << filter2<<endl<<filter3<<endl<<filter4<<endl;
01066       }
01070       if((filter1 > UPPER_LIMIT)||(filter1 < LOWER_LIMIT)) hole_detected_flag = 1;
01071       if((filter2 > UPPER_LIMIT)||(filter2 < LOWER_LIMIT)) hole_detected_flag = 1;
01072       if((filter3 > UPPER_LIMIT)||(filter3 < LOWER_LIMIT)) hole_detected_flag = 1;
01073       if((filter4 > UPPER_LIMIT)||(filter4 < LOWER_LIMIT)) hole_detected_flag = 1;
01074     
01079     for (int i = (REJECTED_HOLES-1); i>0; i--)
01080     {
01081       hole_rejection.at(i) = hole_rejection.at(i-1);
01082       hole_rejection_flag = hole_rejection[i]+hole_rejection_flag;
01083     }
01084     
01089     hole_detected_flag = (hole_rejection_flag==0)&&(hole_detected_flag);
01090     
01091     
01092   
01093     if(hole_detected_flag==1)
01094     {
01099       hole_detected.write(1);
01100       NOH = NOH++;
01101       hole_rejection.at(0) = 1;
01102       hole_rejection_flag =0;
01103       
01119       milliseconds = timebase_data.at(0)%1000;
01120       seconds = (timebase_data.at(0) / 1000) % 60 ;
01121       minutes = ((timebase_data.at(0)/ (1000*60)) % 60);
01127     }
01128     else
01129     {
01130       hole_detected.write(0);
01131       hole_rejection.at(0) = 0;
01132       hole_rejection_flag =0;
01133     } 
01134     
01135     wait();
01136     Iter_num = Iter_num++;
01140       for (int i = 0; i<counter.size(); i++)
01141       {
01142     counter.at(i) = 0;
01143       }
01144     isAhole = 0;
01145     filter1 = 0;
01146     filter2 = 0;
01147     filter3 = 0;
01148     filter4 = 0;
01149   }
01150 }
